comment: I was awful at math, and this is a GenEd Class that I had to take so I wasn't exactly excited about it! TAKE HIM! He knows what he's talking about and he's a student so he knows where you're coming from. He's super clear and will do anything to help you if you don't understand it. He's very thorough and super nice! GREAT PROFESSOR.

Take this class! He is the best math professor I have EVER had. He is a student and  knows what it is like to learn the material for the first time and makes it SO easy to understand. He makes you want to go to class and is super funny
you suck at math? TAKE HIM! HANDS DOWN! He is awesome and is always willing to help you. he wants everyone to do well. GREAT PROFESSOR!
